Title: Pacifist Mode
Description:
This mod makes some changes to Wander mode and adds a new game mode, [b]Pacifist Mode[/b].

[list]
[*] Changes Wander mode to [b]Permadeath Wander Mode[/b], which is a Wander mode variant where:
[list]
[*] You don't get any XP for killing creatures.
[*] You get more XP for discoveries and performing water rituals.
[*] You permanently lose your character when you die.
[/list]
[*] [b]Pacifist Mode[/b]: a Permadeath Wander Mode variant where you die if you kill [i]any[/i] creature*.
[/list]

Source code: https://github.com/kernelmethod/QudMods/tree/main/PacifistMode

* Excluding Templar and Nephilim.
